1.1.name: wordpress/upcoming-posts
1.1.description:
It is good to update your blog regularly. But sometimes it is better to let your readers know exactly what and when you will post something. So I develop this plug-in for whom wants the readers be more curious about his blog.

Features 1. Help you to show cheduled posts or drafts. 2. Configure in the widget: the number of posts; show the excerpt; the time format; a specific category. 3. Make your own style by editing ucp.css and ucp_widget.php files.
